sections.title: Brewkeeper (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Brewkeeper class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Distilled Spells (Su) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: Allows the brewkeeper to spend 1 minute converting prepared extracts or spells into draughts that function as potions or oils usable by anyone, lasting 24 hours before becoming inert.

sections.title: Faithful Drinker (Ex) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: Grants a +2 sacred bonus on Will saves for 1 round when drinking any magical beverage including potions, elixirs, mutagens, or draughts.

sections.title: Brew Reservoir (Su) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: Provides a pool of brew points equal to 3 + brewkeeper level that replenishes when preparing spells/extracts, used to power homebrew effects on draughts, extracts, and spells.

sections.title: Helpful Homebrew (Su) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: Allows spending brew points as a swift action to apply metamagic effects to spells, extracts, or draughts without needing the metamagic feat prerequisites.

sections.title: Harmful Homebrew (Su) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: Enhances splash weapons and touch spells with additional condition effects by spending 1 brew point, with targets making Fortitude saves or suffering conditions like entangled, fatigued, or confused.

sections.title: Potion Master (Ex) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: As a move action when drinking or administering potions, uses the brewkeeper's caster level instead of the potion's and can apply helpful homebrew effects.

sections.title: Brew Specialization (Su) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: Allows applying two helpful or harmful homebrew effects simultaneously when taking a swift action, paying full brew point costs for both effects.

sections.title: Quick Brewing (Su) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: Reduces draught creation time from 1 minute to a full-round action, allowing faster conversion of spells and extracts into draughts.

sections.title: True Brewkeeper (Su) (Brewkeeper)
sections.description: Creates draughts as part of normal casting time or extract drawing, applies up to three homebrew effects at once, and extends faithful drinker bonus to all saves.
